name: Armored Tentacle Siphon
description: The Armored Tentacle Siphon is a grotesque fusion of vermin and cybernetics. Its body resembles that of an oversized rat, but its back is covered in thick metallic plates fused with pulsating bio-tissue. Eight long, prehensile tentacles sprout from its shoulders, each tipped with razor-sharp barbs.

flavor.rationale: These creatures are the result of unregulated bio-augmentation experiments conducted by a rogue corporation. Dumped into the city's sewers and alleys after being deemed too dangerous for further study, they now thrive in the darkness, feeding on any organic matter they can find and defending their territory aggressively.
